name: Snaphost_Windows_Process_Network_Conn
pattern: {"query": "select DISTINCT p.name, p.path, pos.remote_address, pos.remote_port from process_open_sockets pos LEFT JOIN processes p ON pos.pid = p.pid WHERE pos.remote_port != 0 AND p.name != '';", "interval": 28800, "description": "Returns the network connections from system processes - ATT&CK T1086,T1093,T1020,T1041,T1011,T1029,T1043,T1090,T1094,T1024,T1008,T1219,T1105,T1065", "platform": "windows", "snapshot": true}
